elements.label: Bundle of notes
elements.description: A Bundle of notes. It stinks terribly. I think I recognize it: sea water. The package almost feels wet to the touch... The note on it says: A merchant of the memory that does not die.

slots.label: Intent
slots.description: Do I ask for a worldly payment with my Half-Heart, or with intel for further mysteries with my Lack-heart

elements.label: Bundle of notes
elements.description: A Bundle of notes. There is an address on it but it has almost been erased. Good luck finding the recipient... The note on it says: Her rule is “no names” and I will keep to that.

slots.label: Intent
slots.description: Do I ask for a worldly payment with my Half-Heart, or with intel for further mysteries with my Lack-heart

elements.label: Metallic Cylinder
elements.description: A Metallic Cylinder. Words from an unknown language are etched directly into the material, like a dozen thirsty mouths. It's probably just an illusion, but it looks like the blood that stains it is drunk by them. The note on it says: A follower of the Heart Relentless, passing on his knowledge to apprentice Dancers.
